casebody.data:
Joseph BLAZINA, Appellee, v. JAMES McWILLIAMS BLUE LINE, Appellant. No. 63. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 4, 1935. E. C. Sherwood, of New York City (H. H. Brown and George A. Garvey, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Paul C. Matthews, of New York City (Archibald F. McGrath, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
